data.title: Strange Talk with Doc Podcast
data.meta_description: Strange Talk with Doc Podcast and Blog Website where you can also get podcastshow information on Upcoming Episodes or listen to already posted Podcast Episodes of the Strange Talk with Doc Podcast.
data.text:
National Championship Football Game Georgia vs.TCU -1/9-The No. 1 Georgia Bulldogs crushed No. 3 TCU, 65-7, to win their second national -title in as many seasons at SoFi Stadium-Georgia quarterback Stetson Bennett was named offensive MVP of the College Football Playoff championship

1/2-Buffalo Bills safety Damar Hamlin remains in critical condition at the University of Cincinnati Medical Center after he collapsed on the field during Monday night’s game against the Cincinnati Bengals-Bills S Damar Hamlin collapses and is given CPR on the field, NFL suspends game vs. Bengals-1/5-Hamlin’s breathing tube was removed overnight, the Bills said. He spent the morning contacting teammates via FaceTime. He also addressed the entire team during a meeting,

1/2-Donovan Mitchell became only the 7th player in NBA history to score 70+ points in a game as the Cleveland Cavaliers won (scored71)

1-5-NFL announces Bills-Bengals won’t be resumed

1/6-The Vince McMahon saga took another interesting turn this morning, with news that he is officially back on WWE's Board of Directors.-World Wrestling Entertainment confirmed that former CEO and majority shareholder Vince McMahon will be reinstated to the company’s board.

1-6-The Los Angeles Dodgers have designated right-handed pitcher Trevor Bauer for assignment, the team announced late Friday. The move is tantamount to releasing Bauer, Bauer, 31, has not pitched since June 28, 2021, following the process stipulated under MLB's Joint Domestic Violence, Sexual Assault, and Child Abuse Policy.

1-7Naomi Osaka WITHDRAWS from the Australian Open

1-7-Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes sets the NFL record for most single-season offensive yards with 5,614 total offensive yards–.5,250 passing yards, 358 rushing yards & 6 receiving yards

3x DPOY J.J. Watt retires

1/9-A Arizona Cardinals part ways with HC Kliff Kingsbury.

1/11- WWE-Stephanie McMahon resigns, Vince McMahon returns:

1/13-The Golden State Warriors @ San Antonio Spurs game has set a new single-game NBA attendance record, with 68,323 people in the building! GSW wins game144-SAS113

Jon "Bones" Jones has signed a new 8-fight deal with the UFC

Heavyweight Francis N'Gannou has been stripped of his UFC title and is now an unrestricted free agent

1/19-Vince McMahon Reaches Settlement With Former WWE Referee Rita Chatterton

The first UFC champion in #DWCS history: Jamahal Hill UFC 283

Glover Teixeira announces his retirement following the conclusion of UFC 283, Former UFC champion, former PRIDE champion Maurício Shogun Rua also retires during @ UFC 283

Jose Aldo Jr is 2023’s first inductee into the UFC HOF, Jens Pulver 2023 UFC Hall of Fame inductee of the Pioneer Wing.

MLB HOF Scott Rolen is just the 18th third baseman to be inducted into the National Baseball Hall of Fame and Museum - the fewest of any position! Rolen's election means he will join Fred McGriff in Cooperstown this summer after the longtime first baseman was elected by a special committee in December.

Carolina Panthers hired Frank Reich as the new head coach.

Broncos agree to deal with Saints to hire Sean Payton as head coach.

Texans hire DeMeco Ryans as next head coach

Tom Brady announces he is officially retiring.

Coach Autumn Lockwood will become 4th woman to coach in a Super Bowl, and the first Black woman to do so.

2/5-Nets trading star guard Kyrie Irving to Mavericks

7x Pro Bowl WR A.J. Green announces his retirement after 12 seasons

2/7-LeBron James eclipsed Kareem Abdul-Jabbar's all-time scoring record of 38,388 and counting

NBA Trades--Lakers receive: D’Angelo Russell, Malik Beasley, Jarred Vanderbilt Jazz receive: Russell Westbrook, first-round pick Timberwolves receive: Mike Conley, second-round picks

13-time All-Star Kevin Durant and TJ Warren to the Suns for Mikal Bridges, Jae Crowder, Cam Johnson, four first-round picks, and a pick swap.

AP Most Valuable Player Patrick Mahomes, Chiefs quarterback

AP Coach of the Year: Brian Daboll, Giants

AP Comeback Player of the Year: Geno Smith, Seahawks quarterback

AP Offensive Player of the Year Justin Jefferson, Vikings wide receiver

AP Defensive Player of the Year: Nick Bosa, 49ers defensive end

AP Offensive Rookie of the Year: Garrett Wilson, Jets wide receiver

AP Defensive Rookie of the Year: Sauce Gardner, Jets cornerback

Walter Payton NFL Man of the Year Dak Prescott, Cowboys quarterback

FedEx Air & Ground Players of the Year: Joe Burrow, Bengals quarterback; Josh Jacobs, Raiders running back

Pro Football Hall of Fame Class of 2023: Ronde Barber; Darrelle Revis; Joe Thomas; Zach Thomas; DeMarcus Ware; Don Coryell (coach/contributor); Chuck Howley (senior); Joe Klecko (senior); Ken Riley (senior)

New Mexico State suspends men's basketball program indefinitely over multiple reported hazing incidents

A high school basketball game between Weatherford and Anadarko in Oklahoma ended in a score of 4-2

Super Bowl Chiefs beat Eagles 38-35, The Chiefs won their second NFL title in four years, and two-time NFL MVP Patrick Mahomes earned his second Super Bowl MVP award. in the first Super Bowl matchup featuring two Black starting QBs.

Colts hire Shane Steichen as new head coach-The Arizona Cardinals hire Jonathan Gannon as a new head coach..-Eric Bieniemy is headed to Washington to become the Commander's offensive coordinator.

Raiders release QB Derek Carr

2/18- XFL 2ND Season Begins

2/16-A Clark County grand jury has indicted New Orleans Saints running back Alvin Kamara and three others for an alleged beating at a Las Vegas nightclub last year

3PT winner Damian Lillard, Skills champion, Utah Jazz, Mac McClung ATT Slam Dunk Contest

Team Giannis WINS the 2023 NBA All-Star Game184-175 over team Lebron- Jayson Tatum is the 2023 NBA All-Star Game MVP with 55 Points

Brittney Griner re-signs to the Phoenix Mercury for one year, returning to the WNBA after her release from a Russian prison in December.

3/4-UFC 285-Jon Jones (c) def. Ciryl Gane via first-round submission (guillotine choke)- Jones earns heavyweight title with a first-round submission Jones joins his rival Daniel Cormier in claiming both the light heavyweight and heavyweight titles

3-4-UFC 285-Alexa Grasso def. Valentina Shevchenko (c) via fourth-round submission (rear-naked choke to earn flyweight title-It ended Valentina Shevchenko's nine-fight winning streak and her eight-fight championship winning streak

Commanders release QB Carson Wentz, Falcons release QB Marcus Mariota.Vikings release WR Adam Thielen.

Jaguars WR Calvin Ridley reinstated 1 year after sports betting ban

Seahawks, QB Geno Smith agrees to three-year, $105M deal

Saints sign QB Derek Carr to a 4-year deal.

Giants signing QB Daniel Jones to a four-year extension worth $160M

NFL franchise tag-Tony Pollard, Raiders tag Josh Jacobs, Jaguars tag Evan Engram, Giants tag RB Saquon Barkley, Ravens place the non-exclusive franchise tag on QB Lamar Jackson.

Jim Boeheim's tenure as Syracuse men's basketball coach has come to an end after 47 years. He was inducted into the Naismith Basketball Hall of Fame in 2005.

Patrick Ewing is out as men's basketball coach at Georgetown after six seasons, going 75-109-presided over a 29-game Big East losing streak that began in March 2021 and ended this January, the most consecutive defeats in league history.

The Chicago Bears sent the No. 1 pick to the Carolina Panthers for wide receiver D.J. Moore, the No. 9 pick, the No. 61 pick, a 2024 first-round pick, and a 2025 second-round pick

Patriots safety Devin McCourty 3X Super Bowl champion announces retirement after 13 seasons

Rey Mysterio is the 1st inductee for the 2023 WWE HOF, The Great Muta will be inducted into the WWE Hall of Fame class of 2023-, and Andy Kaufman will be inducted into the Class of 2023, WWE Diva Stacy Keibler 2023 Hall of Fame-Tim White will be posthumously inducted into the WWE Hall of Fame as a Warrior Award recipient

Scottie Scheffler has won THE PLAYERS Championship 2023\

March Madness Men & Women-3/17-No. 16 Fairleigh Dickinson shocks No. 1 Purdue 63-58

3/13-The NBA and NBPA will agree on the rule that a player must play in a minimum number of games to be eligible for major awards

3/13-Memphis Grizzlies star Ja Morant has entered a counseling program-The NBA is suspending Ja Morant for eight games without pay for conduct detrimental to the league, The suspension includes the games he's already missed. Morant is eligible to return to the Memphis Grizzlies lineup on March 20

3/17-UFC fighter Jeff Molina comes out as bisexual after intimate video leaks

World Baseball Classic: Shohei Ohtani closes out Team USA as Japan wins 3rd title-MVP: Shohei Ohtani!

The Elite Eight won’t feature any No. 1 seeds for the first time in NCAA men's tournament history.

UFC-Donald 'Cowboy' Cerrone to join Anderson Spider Silva, Jose AldoJr. and Jens Lil Evil Pulver in 2023 Hall of Fame Class

First Final Four since 1970 with 3 teams making their first appearance of Maimi, San Deigo State & Florida Atlantic

Women Final Four Virginia Tech, South Carolina, LSU & Iowa--LSU defeats Iowa 102-85 for its first NCAA championship in women’s basketball-Angel Reese named Most Outstanding Player of 2023 NCAA Women’s Championship

Men Final Four UConn, Miami, Florida Atlantic & San Deigo State--UConn 76-59 win over San Diego State in the national championship game for The 5th Nat'l Championship in school history.UConn's Adama Sanogo NCAA tournament Most Outstanding Player award

NBA HOF Class of 2023- Dwyane Wade, Dirk Nowitzki, Pau Gasol, Tony Parker, Becky Hammon, and Gregg Popovich

3/30-the Sacramento Kings After 16 long years, the longest playoff drought the NBA has ever seen is now officially over

4/4--WWE merges with Endeavor, the parent company of UFC, with a valuation of over $21 billion new company, which will house both WWE and UFC, will have a 51/49 control split in favor of Endeavor

5x Masters Champion Tiger Woods 23 consecutive made cuts at The Masters, tying Fred Couples and Gary Player for most of all time. Woods withdraws from The Masters due to reaggravating his plantar fasciitis.

Jon Rahm roars from behind to win the 2023 Masters, Rahm claims his first green jacket, erasing a two-stroke deficit to win the Masters going away.

Sam Bennett wins 2023 Masters, Low Amateur, finishes tied for 16th

4/11-Luis Arraez hit for the cycle. The first Florida or Miami Marlins player in 30 seasons to do it... The last team in the majors to hit for their first cycle

Tampa Bay Rays set a franchise record, the MLB record with the 13th straight win to open the regular season

The NBA announced the Dallas Mavericks were fined $750,000 for "conduct detrimental to the league in an elimination game" after sitting some of their most productive players against the Chicago Bulls on April 7 to better their draft position.

Former Charlotte Hornets forward Miles Bridges has been suspended 30 games, the NBA announced Friday 4/14, after the league conducted its own internal investigation into Bridges' domestic violence arrest on June 27, 2022. Bridges didn't play during the 2022-23 season, The NBA "deemed" 20 games of that suspension have already been served and he'll miss only 10 games if he signs with another team.

Rory McIlroy has withdrawn from the RBC Heritage McIlroy's absence from the designated event in Hilton Head Island, S.C., will incur a $3 million fine. (He has not provided a reason for his withdrawal). the money will be deducted from the money he made from the Player Impact Program (PIP) last season.

The NFL suspended five players Friday for violating the league's gambling policy. Among the group was Detroit Lions wide receiver Jameson Williams, a first-round pick in the 2022 draft from Alabama. Williams and fellow Lions receiver Stanley Berryhill will sit the team's first six games of the upcoming season for betting from an NFL facility on non-NFL games. Meanwhile, Quintez Cephus and C.J. Moore – who also played for the Lions – and the Washington Commanders' Shaka Toney have been suspended indefinitely. Because the trio placed bets on NFL games during the 2022 season, the league said, those suspensions will last through at least this season. The players are eligible for reinstatement at the conclusion of the league year.-Lions waive WR Stanley Berryhill, who was suspended for violating the NFL's gambling policy

Houston Rockets hire Ime Udoka as head coach

NFL Draft: At No. 1 Panthers get Alabama's Bryce Young The first-ever No. 1 overall pick out of Alabama Football.

The 2022-23 Kia NBA Most Valuable Player is Joel Embiid

5/4-Milwaukee Bucks have fired head coach Mike Budenholzer

Kentucky Derby: 12horse die at Churchill Downs in lead-up to main event-Mage wins 149th running of Derby

5/12-Washington Commanders' record sale agreed by Snyder family, Harris group that includes Magic Johnson-Harris reportedly agrees to buy the team for $6 billion

Suns fire head coach Monty Williams after NBA playoffs elimination

the Renegades -- led by quarterback Luis Perez -- beat the heavily favored D.C. Defenders 35-26 for the XFL title

The San Antonio Spurs won the 2023 NBA draft lottery and the right to select French super-prospect Victor Wembanyama with the No. 1 overall pick

5/14-The Grizzlies have suspended Ja Morant from all team activities after another incident on social media-apparently flashed a gun on social media.

76ers fire head coach Doc Rivers

Brooks Koepka wins the 2023 PGA Championship for his fifth career major win

Carmelo Anthony officially retires from the NBA after 19 seasons

The Philadelphia 76ers are hiring Nick Nurse as their new head coach

Detroit Pistons have hired former Phoenix Suns head coach Monty Williams

The Phoenix Suns tap former NBA champion coach Frank Vogel as their new head coach

6/6-PGA/Liv/DPgolf MERGE

Women's College World Series: Oklahoma 53-0 clinches 3rd straight national title with 3-1 win over Florida State

Amanda Nunes announces her retirement after defending her bantamweight title

THE VEGAS GOLDEN KNIGHTS ARE YOUR 2022-23 STANLEY CUP CHAMPIONS!!!

Denver Nuggets Win First Ever Title as They Defeat Miami Heat in 2023 NBA Finals 4 Games to 1, Nikola Jokić Named Finals MVP

6/16- Ja Morant will be suspended for 25 games\

6/17-Bob Huggins resigns at West Virginia: Hall of Fame coach steps down from the post in the wake of DUI arrest

Wyndham Clark is a major champion at the U.S. Open Championship

Lou Williams, 3-time Sixth Man of the Year and the NBA’s all-time leading bench scorer., announces retirement after 17 seasons

The Celtics have reportedly acquired Kristaps Porzingis & dealt Marcus Smart to the Grizzlies in a three-team trade

On June 24, 2023, the Suns traded Paul, Landry Shamet, four first-round draft picks, and six second-round draft picks to the Washington Wizards for Bradley Beal–On 6/22- the Wizards traded Chris Paul to the Warriors for Jordan Poole, future draft picks

2023 NBA Draft: San Antonio Spurs select Victor Wembanyama with the No. 1 overall pick

LSU football vacates all wins from 2012-2015, and Les Miles is now ineligible for the CFB Hall of Fame Tigers are vacating 37 wins, including two bowl game wins, because a former player was ineligible for his entire college career.

LSU rolls over Florida to close out Men's College World Series, win the national championship

6/28-Yankees' Domingo Germán throws 24th perfect game in MLB history

7/8-Matt Manning, Jason Foley, and Alex Lange combine for Detroit Tigers' no-hitter for a 2-0 win over the Blue Jays at Comerica Park

7/20-NFL clubs unanimously & NFL approves a $6.05B sale of Washington Commander's sale to a group led by Josh Harris and includes Magic Johnson and additional partners.

7/23- Michael Jordan's sale of Hornets officially approved by the NBA,The purchase, at an approximate $3 billion valuation

Two-time All-Star wing Jaylen Brown has agreed to a five-year, $304 million supermax contract extension with the Boston Celtics, making him the highest-paid player in NBA history

Bronny James, son of LeBron James, suffers cardiac arrest at USC basketball practice

7/29-Terence Crawford punished Errol Spence on the way to a ninth-round technical knockout.-Bud scores impressive win for all 4 belts–Crawford is now the owner of all four titles, IBF-WBA-WBC-WBO, in a second weight class, the first time a male fighter has accomplished the feat in the four-belt era

8/1-Houston Astros' Framber Valdez pitches no-hitter against Cleveland Guardians

8/9-Former NFL and Raiders Henry Ruggs sentenced to three-to-10 years in prison for DUI crash that killed a 23-year-old woman

8/9-Michael Lorenzen throws no-hitter in Phillies’ win over Nationals

NBA HOF Class of 2023-Pau Gasol, Becky Hammon,Dirk Nowitzki,Gregg Popovich,Dwyane Wade

Spain beats England to win Women's World Cup

9/1/2023-Aaron Judge becomes MLB's fastest player to 250 career homers

American Coco Gauff, 19, won her first Grand Slam title, after taking the U.S. Open women's singles title in three sets against Aryna Sabalenka from Belarus

14 black QB’S TO START WEEK 1 IN THE NFL

Novak Djokovic wins the US Open for the FOURTH TIME!

Aaron Rodgers suffered a complete tear of his left Achilles tendon, out for the season in game #1

SEPT-released by WWE-Maximum Male Models-Mace & Mansoor-Dolph Ziggler-Dana Brooke-Madcap Riddick Moss-Dabba Kato-Shelton Benjamin-Shanky-Mustafa Ali-Aliyah-Rick Boogs-Top Dolla-Emma-Matt Riddle

Friday Night SmackDown show will be moving from Fox to USA Network next year,

Ronald Acuña Jr. becomes 5th player in MLB history to join 40-40 club and 1st to reach 40-60

Week 3 NFL season - Patrick Mahomes became the fastest NFL quarterback to reach 25,000 career passing yards

9/27-Michigan State fires Mel Tucker: Fourth-year coach removed amid sexual harassment allegations

NBA Trade Milwaukee receives: Damian Lillard Portland receives: Jrue Holiday, Deandre Ayton, Toumani Camara, Bucks 2029 first-round pick, and two pick swaps from the Bucks Phoenix receives: Jusuf Nurkic, Nassir Little, Keyon Johnson, Grayson Allen-- Jrue Holiday then traded to the Boston Celtics

Jade Cargill has signed a multi-year contract with WWE

Ege Adam Copeland signs with AEW

Miguel Cabrera joins Willie Mays and Hank Aaron as the only players in AL/NL history to finish their career with a .300+ average, 500+ home runs, and 3,000+ hits.

10/12-Patrick Mahomes: The fastest QB ever to beat the 31 other teams

The Las Vegas Aces become the third team in #WNBA History to win back-to-back titles beating the New York Liberty 3 games to 1–1st repeat champions in 21 years- A’ja Wilson is your 2023 WNBA Finals MVP!

Jose Altuve’s ALCS record-breaking homer

Adolis García Texas Ranger ALCS MVP!

Ketel Marte Arizona Diamondback NLCS MVP

World Series Arizona Diamondbacks vs. the Texas Rangers

300 career regular season wins for Bill Belichick!

Dusty Baker retires after 26 seasons as MLB manager and spent 19 years in the big leagues as an All-Star outfielder.

76ers reach deal to trade James Harden to Los Angeles Clippers

THE TEXAS RANGERS ARE WORLD SERIES CHAMPIONS beating the Arizona Diamondback 4 games to 1 and the team's first title! TEXAS goes 11-0 on the Road throughout the playoffs Corey Seager becomes the First player to win MVP in the World Series in both leagues

CJ Stroud has 5 TDs and a rookie-record 470 yards on ints vs the Colts

Big Ten suspends Jim Harbaugh 3 games for Michigan's alleged sign-stealing scheme

The NL Manager of the Year Award winner is Skip Schumaker of the Miami Marlins

The AL Manager of the Year Award winner is Brandon Hyde of the Baltimore Orioles

The 2023 Jackie Robinson NL Rookie of the Year Award goes to Corbin Carroll of the Diamondbacks

The 2023 Jackie Robinson AL Rookie of the Year Award winner is Gunnar Henderson of the Orioles

The 2023 AL Cy Young Award winner is Gerrit Cole!

The 2023 NL Cy Young Award winner is Blake Snell!

Ravens TE Mark Andrews (ankle) will be out for the season.

Deshaun Watson is out for the season as the Browns QB needs surgery on a fractured shoulder

Bengals QB Joe Burrow is out for the season with a torn ligament in his wrist

For the second time in three years, Shohei Ohtani is the American League’s Most Valuable Player

Ronald Acuña Jr. is the 2023 National League Most Valuable Player!

Draymond Green has been suspended for five games by the NBA

The Oakland Athletics have been unanimously approved by owners for relocation to Las Vegas.

LeBron James becomes the first player in NBA history to reach 39,000 points h

Cowboys' DaRon Bland breaks NFL single-season pick-six record with fifth of 2023 in game 11

Jim Leyland is headed to the Hall of Fame!

Juan Soto traded to New York Yankees from San Diego Padres in 7-player blockbuster

BRONNY JAMES IN HIS USC DEBUT 5 MONTHS AFTER SUFFERING CARDIAC ARREST: 4 PTS, 3 REB, 2 AST, 2 STL, 1 BLK, 1/3 3PM, 16 MIN, in a Loss to LBC

Jon Rahm joins LIV Golf for $570million -Rahm’s addition gives LIV Golf seven of the last 14 winners at the majors

THE FIRST-EVER NBA IN-SEASON TOURNAMENT CHAMPIONSHIP-The Los Angeles Lakers win in Vegas to become the first-ever NBA In-Season Tournament Champions!-LeBron James is the first-ever NBA In-Season Tournament MVP!

LSU senior quarterback Jayden Daniels, the 2023 Heisman Trophy winner!

Shohei Ohtani signed with the Los Angeles Dodgers for a record $700 million

Draymond Green will have to await a league office review and the possibility of another suspension after smacking Jusuf Nurkic in the head NBA is suspending Draymond Green indefinitely

Chargers QB Justin Herbert is out for the season following surgery on a fractured right index finger.

Chargers fire head coach Brandon Staley, GM Tom Telesco

12/23-Pistons fall to Nets for 26th straight loss, tie record for longest single-season losing streak in NBA history 12-26-The Detroit Pistons have set the record for the longest losing streak in an NBA season.-12-28-Detroit Pistons blow 21-point first-half lead and lose to the Boston Celtics to tie the record for the NBA's longest ever losing streak at 28 games-12-30-The Detroit Pistons have snapped their losing streak with a 129-127 win over the Toronto Raptors

Caitlin Clark makes history as she becomes the first athlete - male or female - to have 3,000+ points, 900+ assists and 800+ rebounds in a career

COVID-19 USA-55M Cases 845K Dead Vaccinated 507M

WW-285M Cases 5.5M Dead-Delta'--Omicron Variant

4/22-Millions of Americans are not getting the second doses of their COVID-19 vaccines

SuperCovid-New Variants

U.S. Capitol Riots-Protest vs Riot

America’s Race issues--White Privilege

Former Vice President Mike Pence has said he will support the bid by Republican Senators to overturn Joe Biden's election win in Congress

Trump's phone call with Georgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger leaked-find 11,780 votes

Trump Tweets-Vice President has the power to reject fraudulently chosen electors,

The Leader of the Proud Boys Henry "Enrique" Tarrio was arrested for destruction of property, He is also facing weapons charges after officers found him with two high-capacity firearm magazines

Proud Boys leader Enrique Tarrio has a past as an informer law enforcement repeatedly working undercover for investigators after he was arrested in 2012, records show

Military Bases Deaths

Members of Congress are required to use 'Gender-Inclusive language-References to fathers, mothers, sons, daughters, brothers, sisters, husbands, wives are to be changed to 'parent, child, sibling, spouse'

Democrats Raphael Warnock 1ST Black Person Ever & Jon Ossoff claimed victory in Georgia Senate

Democrats take control of Senate

Stacey Abrams becomes a Major Player in shaping Politics

Sitting President Trump gets Social Media Ban

Nancy Pelosi has written to Democrats saying that, unless Mike Pence invokes the 25th Amendment, they will proceed with impeachment

January 20 Inauguration Peaceful

Trump declares state of emergency in DC ahead of Biden's Inauguration

Deutsche Bank and Signature Bank will 'sever ties with Trump and his organization

Capitol Police last night briefed Congress about three more plots to attack the legislature in the next few days, including 'the largest armed protest ever to take place in America

The U.S. House of Representatives on 1/13 Approved a non-binding resolution that calls on Vice President Mike Pence to invoke the 25th Amendment to the Constitution to remove Trump from office

Womb raider' killer Lisa Montgomery is Executed - the First Female Federal Prisoner in 67 years

D.C.'s biggest Corporate Donors including Amazon, GE, Verizon, and Best Buy plunge Republicans into cash crisis by boycotting 'treason caucus' and other firms stop ALL Political Donations

Trump becomes the first president to be Impeached for a Second Time

$730M PowerBall The winning ticket was sold in Maryland 1/20/2021, $1B Mega Millions-The winning ticket was sold in Michigan 1/22/20201

143 Pardons and Commutations Trump issued during his final hours in the office

Donald Trump 2nd Impeachment Trial is set to begin February 9

Ammo shortage -Gun Stores Empty and Online No Stock

National Rifle Association Filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection

Nissan is recalling more than 354,000 Pathfinder SUVs-Honda will recall around 761,000 vehicles worldwide to replace fuel pumps

The Transportation Security Administration (TSA) will turn away any passengers who try to enter airport terminals, board planes, trains or buses without masks, and those who refuse could face federal fines

1st Black United States Secretary of Defense Retired 4 Star General Lloyd Austin orders troops to stand down for 60 days to address 'white nationalism and extremism in the ranks

The House voted 230-199 to remove Marjorie Taylor Greene from her committee assignments for her past comments and posts aligning herself with QAnon conspiracy theories

Biden says Trump will NOT receive intelligence briefings

Saturday, February 13th the Senate acquitted Donald j trump for a 2nd time by a vote of 57 quilty to 43 not guilty

At Least 47 Dead and 5 Million without power as Winter Storm Uri sweeps the Nation

Dr Anthony Fauci warned that Americans could be wearing masks into 2022

Crazy Ted Cruz Cancun, Water, Mullet & Senate Votes

Supreme Court refuses to hear Donald Trump's bid to stop Subpoena for his Tax Returns and other Documents Issued to his longtime Accountants

New York Prosecutors has obtained copies of Donald Trump’s Tax Records

House passed a bill that would Enshrine LGBTQ protections in the nation's Labor and Civil Rights Laws

2/27The FDA has Authorized the third Vaccine with Johnson & Johnson One-Shot Jab

3/2 The governors of Texas and Mississippi have announced they are lifting all COVID-19 restrictions and mask mandates, with businesses able to reopen at full capacity

Boy Scouts of America is proposing to pay $220 million toward a trust to compensate tens of thousands of former members who say they were abused during their time as scouts

Hate Incidents against Asian Americans on the Rise -3/16 Robert Aaron Long Kills Eight people who were shot dead at three separate massage parlors in Atlanta

3/7 Senate finally Passes $1.9 Trillion Covid Bill with No support from Republicans

3/8 Americans who are fully Vaccinated Against COVID-19 can Gather without Masks or Social Distancing, new CDC guidelines say

DeepFakes Technology

3/12 President Joe Biden signed his $1.9 Trillion COVID Relief Plan into Law

3/15 The Vatican issued an official verdict on the issue on Monday It said gay people should be treated with 'respect' but their unions, not blessed Blessing unions would 'approve and encourage' a same-sex lifestyle, it said- because God 'cannot bless sin'

3/22 Ahmad Alissa Boulder Mass Shooter-10 people were Shot Dead at King Soopers Grocery Store

Rachel Levine is confirmed as assistant health secretary to make her the first openly transgender person to be ratified for the cabinet by the Senate

New York City is set to become First Major City in the Nation to end Qualified Immunity for Police Officers

Georgia’s New Election laws create stricter Voter Identification requirements for Absentee balloting, limits drop boxes, impose Shorter Voting Hours, and even makes it a Crime to offer food or water to Citizens waiting to vote

4/1 Me & The Wife Received First Covid Vaccination Dose- 2nd dose of Pfizer 4/22--12/29 Booster shot

4/02 Noah Green, 25, drove his car into a barricade at the Capitol on Killing Capitol Police Officer Billy Evans

As of April 2, 2021, most states have dropped domestic travel restrictions for both vaccinated and unvaccinated people

4/12 Kimberly Potter, a 26-year veteran of the force shot dead Unarmed Daunte Wright a 20-year-old black man during a traffic stop in Minneapolis ten miles from The George Floyd Muder Site-Brooklyn Center police chief and the officer who shot and killed Daunte Wright Resign- Charged with Second-Degree Manslaughter

4/15 Gunman Brandon Scott Hole 19 went on a Rampage with an Assault Rifle at a FedEx Warehouse near Indianapolis Airport before shooting himself dead-Eight Confirmed Deaths

Derek Chauvin trial Started 3/29/21 ON 4/20- the Jury found him Guilty of Second-degree unintentional Murder, Third-degree Murder, and Second-degree Manslaughter in the death of George Floyd

Rash of Police Shootings After Chauvin verdict including-Andrew Brown, Ma'Khia Bryant, Isaiah Brown

4/29 The DOJ is now planning to indict Derek Chauvin and the three other cops involved in Floyd's death on civil rights charges J. Alexander Kueng, Thomas Lane, and Tou Thao

Federal investigators executed a search warrant 4/26 on Rudy Giuliani's NYC apartment and his office

4/29 Gregory McMichael, 65, and his son Travis, 35, shot and William 'Roddie' Bryan who killed Ahmad Arbery All three had Federal hate crimes added to their rap sheet

5/06 The Colonial Pipeline between Texas and New Jersey was hacked-5/11 Florida, Virginia, Georgia, and North Carolina declare states of emergency over gas shortages after Colonial Pipeline hack as 1,000 fuel stations run dry in Southeast

5/15 Statewide Mask Mandates in most states moved

5/18 District Attorney Andrew Womble found the shooting to be justified and that deputies would not face charges in Andrew Brown's death

5/24 25th Wedding Anniversary

Cancer Scare-Cologruard-Barium Enema

Champlain Towers South beachfront building collapsed at about 1.30 am on 6/24 in Miami's Surfside neighborhood 145 other people still unaccounted for at the collapse site death toll rises to at least 18

6/25 Derek Chauvin sentenced to 22.5 years in prison for the murder of George Floyd

6/30 Bill Cosby released from prison

The Boys Scouts of America has reached an $850billion settlement with 60,000 men who brought child sex abuse claims against the organization

Heat Wave Summer 2021

Disgraced lawyer Michael Avenatti is sentenced to 2.5 years in prison for trying to s7/27 The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommended that fully vaccinated Americans in parts of the country with "substantial or high transmission" of COVID-19 should return to wearing masks indoors, citing new data on the highly contagious Delta variant

7/30-8-17 Las Vegas to Require Masks Indoors Including on Casino Floorshake down Nike for $25M

8/10 New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo resigned from office one week after an investigation concluded that he had sexually harassed 11 women and retaliated against his accusers

Batman's sidekick Robin comes out as bisexual
